summary: In the early west, a young husband's trials in raising his child after his wife's unexpected death.
cast: Wes Brown|Cheryl Ladd|Bruce Boxleitner|Julie Mond|Morgan Lily|Willow Geer|Tyler Jacob Moore|Kirk B.R. Woller|James Eckhouse|Courtney Marmo|Drea Pressley
title: Love's Everlasting Courage
